name: Damp
description: Reduces sudden jerkiness in movements for smoother robot motion.

name: BalanceStand
description: Keeps the robot upright and balanced while standing.

name: StopMove
description: Immediately halts all robot movement.

name: StandUp
description: Makes the robot stand upright from a resting position.

name: StandDown
description: Transitions the robot from a standing posture to a lower stance.

name: RecoveryStand
description: Regains balance if the robot tumbles or leans too far.

name: Euler
description: Adjusts orientation using Euler angles.

name: Move
description: Executes a basic forward, backward, or lateral walk.

name: Sit
description: Instructs the robot to lower itself into a seated posture.

name: RiseSit
description: Stands the robot from a seated position.

name: SwitchGait
description: Changes the current walking gait (e.g., trot, crawl).

name: Trigger
description: Fires an internal event or action sequence in the robot.

name: BodyHeight
description: Adjusts the robot’s standing height.

name: FootRaiseHeight
description: Sets how high the feet lift off the ground.

name: SpeedLevel
description: Changes the walking or running speed.

name: Hello
description: Performs a greeting gesture.

name: Stretch
description: Extends limbs for a stretch routine.

name: TrajectoryFollow
description: Follows a predefined path or trajectory.

name: ContinuousGait
description: Engages a continuous stepping pattern.

name: Content
description: Executes a general content command or interaction.

name: Wallow
description: Performs a slow rolling or swaying movement.

name: Dance1
description: Starts a programmed dance routine #1.

name: Dance2
description: Starts a different programmed dance routine.

name: GetBodyHeight
description: Retrieves the current standing height.

name: GetFootRaiseHeight
description: Reports the foot raise height setting.

name: GetSpeedLevel
description: Returns the current walking or running speed.

name: SwitchJoystick
description: Toggles external joystick control mode.

name: Pose
description: Holds the robot in a specific posture.

name: Scrape
description: Performs a ground-scraping action.

name: FrontFlip
description: Executes a forward flip trick.

name: LeftFlip
description: Performs a leftward flip trick.

name: RightFlip
description: Performs a rightward flip trick.

name: BackFlip
description: Executes a backward flip stunt.

name: FrontJump
description: Leaps forward from a standing position.

name: FrontPounce
description: Performs a quick forward pounce.

name: WiggleHips
description: Moves the hips side-to-side in a playful motion.

name: GetState
description: Returns the robot’s current status.

name: EconomicGait
description: Switches to a power-saving walking pattern.

name: LeadFollow
description: Engages a lead-and-follow mode with another robot or user.

name: FingerHeart
description: Makes a small heart shape with the robot’s hands.

name: Bound
description: Moves in a bounding pattern (two legs at a time).

name: MoonWalk
description: Performs a walking motion that mimics the moonwalk.

name: OnesidedStep
description: Steps repeatedly on one side to pivot or circle.

name: CrossStep
description: Executes cross-stepping movements.

name: Handstand
description: Flips the robot onto its forelimbs for a handstand.

name: StandOut
description: Extends limbs outward for a wide posture.

name: FreeWalk
description: Allows the robot to roam in a free-walking mode.
